Create a draft for a Quote

parameters.message: What did this user request, or how did the job go? Do you want to respond to the clients remarks?

nodes.name: Write the Post on GoogleBus Profile

parameters.subject: =Review/Complaint {{ $('Ticket Generator').item.json.ticketNumber }}
parameters.message: Hello, We have received your review.  Would you like to add any other details to this review, explaining the job, work performed, quality of the work?   The more details the better!

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.text: =Hello, I need to generate a post about our company efforts in helping a user named,  {{ $('Information Extractor').item.json.output.Name }}, who wrote this review "{{ $('Information Extractor').item.json.output.Message }}."  He did add the following information, this can be blank, where if it is please disregard, "{{ $json.bodyPreview }}"  I want you to create a response without Fluff, do not tell me its an SEO optimized post or respond to it, just create the post ready to copy into Google business Post and WordPress. In this post I want you to reference our company as "Moreno Flight Aerials" and quote the user's initial response and details for the public to see. You are creating a post that both shows the posted Review, create the fluff as our company to the world as a response and making it feel like a quality, workmanship driven, enthusiastic company that cares and are assisting our customers in every way we can.

options.systemMessage: You are a Marketing Master! You know exactly what to write and what to put in this Post for the best SEO marketing strategy.  You are great with words and create great marketing posts that drive customers back and new ones after reading your posts.

parameters.text:
=Hello, I need to generate a post title from this recently created post. Do not give us explainations, I just want the title ready to copy and paste into the post:
"{{ $json.output }}"
